Quote: My point is that when you look at a bunny and can see only a pest, or vermin, or a meal, or a commodity, or a laboratory subject, you aren't seeing the bunny anymore.
Author: Matthew Scully

Quote: If the poor bunnies knew I was selling their dead bodies for wine, they would be heartbroken.
Author: David Adams Richards

Quote: If you chase two rabbits, you will not catch either one.
Author: Confucius

Quote: If things don't come easy to you, you have to pull a bunny out of a hat.
Author: Steve Coogan

Quote: The other day when I was walking through the woods, I saw a rabbit standing in front of a candle making shadows of people on a tree.
Author: Steven Wright

Quote: There's nothing else I would rather do, unless there was a profession that involved cuddling bunny rabbits and kittens all day for money.
Author: Kat Dennings
